DOC.brief_summary: During project effect modify wheat bran colon health systemic health evaluate long-term intervention study healthy obese subject .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Modified Wheat Bran Carbohydrate Fermentation Colon Healthy Obese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 65 year old BMI 18 25 kg/m² OR high 30 kg/m² Regular diet Not diet Use antibiotic month precede study Diabetes Type 1 2 Abdominal surgery ( except appendectomy ) Use medication affect gastrointestinal tract last 2 week prior study include spasmolytic , antidiarrhoea medication , anticonstipation medication Use pre probiotic supplement month precede study Chronic gastrointestinal disease , inflammatory bowel disease ( Crohn 's disease , ulcerative colitis ) , irritable bowel disease… Pregnancy lactation Blood donation last 3 month Abnormal Hblevel ( Standard range 14 18 g/dL men 12 16 g/dL woman ) Participation clinical study involve radiation exposure past year
